summary: Tired with the current animation for one handed weapon ? Ever asked why your female has the same movement as male? This mod will replace vanilla animation to new motion. Male and Female can have different animation now. You won\'t bother anymore when the male looks feminine because of female motion. They have their own. Latest version is v1.4
descriptionHtml:
[center]
WHAT IS NEW AND FEATURED IN THE MOD
======================================
It change how you character Equip, Idle stand, Walk and Run (not all direction), also New sprinting motion that intended to be used with shield (default mod). The Male won\'t have same motion for female with Female exclusive system added in the mod.

If you want to make it apply only to your character, Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14871]PC Exclusive Animation Path[/url]
It also could apply only to NPC too with PCEA but you might have do manual install.

[color=pink]If you like it, please give your endorsement and give comments too. Go back to for a simple endorsement click won\'t hurt you.[/color]

UPDATE
=======
v1.4.2 
patched for Skyrim v1.8 
integration with FNIS 3.3.x

VIDEO SAMPLE
=============

[youtube]z8RshEcTr88[/youtube]
motion that shown in above video are refer to female of version 1.4
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[youtube]VTMxuXvbb_A[/youtube]
[color=yellow]motion that shown in above video are refer to female of version 1.2[/color]
For head/earphone user, lower the volume

[youtube]lHwC85iTSAw[/youtube] [youtube]SHPmxH8y2hY[/youtube]

-------------------------featured in Skyrim Mods Series by MxR -------------------------- Skyrim Mod Spotlight by Brodual-------------------------

[youtube]fBvNvIjveN4[/youtube]  [youtube]wrYNwHMpkOg[/youtube]

Note: motion that shown in above video are refer to version 1, not the latest version (1.2)
[/center]

PERMISSION
===========
Please notify me if you happen to include the files
author: xp32

files.changelogHtml:
Remade of 1HM running motion
Dual 1HM wield motion for sprint
Magic/Dual Magic Sprint
Renamed 1hm idle to dual idle (optional, for better transition)
